page.title: 12EDUCATION.
page.content: Tere are three schools in this area,two primary and one upper school. (Primary Schools) Collingtree C.E.Primary School. The village primary school in Collingtree was opened in 1861 since then a new extention has been added in 1982.The school has 60 pupils between the ages of 5 and 11. Milton Malsor Parochial Primary School. Milton village school again takes pupils aged between 5 and 11,at present there are 46 children at the school. (Upper Schools) Mereway Upper School. This is a large school taking about 800 pupils between the ages of 13 and 18.
